preparation.raw_text:
1. Weigh out 50 g of Bismuth using a digital scale. 
 2. Measure 10 g of Gallium. 
 3. Weigh 30 g of Scandium. 
 4. Measure 30 g of Terbium. 
 5. In a clean, dry container, combine the measured amounts thoroughly using a spatula to ensure an even mixture.
